page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT OUT OF MARTHAM
page.content: Most families in our class went to outdoor entertainments in other villages.Here are some of the entertainments people went to. Swimming is an entertainment enjoyed by a lot of people.Cricket was also quite popular in our class.Another popular one was the beach and amusements.The most popular entertainment in the villages was the pub.Many people played snooker, pool and darts here.Quite a lot of people came here regularly. Cinemas were popular in our class.Some are in Yarmouth & some in Norwich. Restaurants & Theatres were also popular in Yarmouth & Norwich & leisure parks.The seafront in Yarmouth had quite a lot to offer eg The piers & circus's,the Marina centre,amusement arcades,model village etc.The Marina centre is a large leisure centre.
